<title level="1" right="Action">[Affix a Fulu](/Actions.aspx?ID=772) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 158 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

You affix a [fulu](/equipment/consumables/fulu) to an armor, weapon, shield, creature, or structure that's beside or in the same square as you. A creature can remove a fulu from itself or an unattended object in its reach with a single action.
name: Affix a Fulu
